authors.imageAlt: Picture of Vladimir Damynov and Damyan Damyanov

vladimir.name: Vladimir Damynov
vladimir.p1: Winner of the Annual Award of the Society of Plovdiv Artists (Sculpture, 2024)
vladimir.p2: His mosaic panels participate in many exhibitions in Bulgaria, Sweden, Norway, Austria, Germany, Italy, France, Great Britain, and the USA.
vladimir.p3: He further broadens his artistic range with abstract compositions in glass ceramics.

damyan.name: Damyan Damyanov
damyan.p1: Master of mosaic with his own style.
damyan.p2: His works have been presented in numerous exhibitions.
damyan.p3: His compositions are made entirely with natural stones: black marl, syenite, marble, granite, tiger's eye, limestone species, rock crystals, and semi-precious stones like jasper, agate and others.
